item.title: Rat in the tree!, 29th September
item.description:
I never knew rats went up into the trees! I was walking here at the weekend, looked up to try and find what I thought was a bird in the trees and nines a rat!! Please can you deal. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London

item.title: Overhanging Tree- restricting view when reversing/ leaving property, 29th September
item.description:
There is a tree outside number 18 which completely stops the view when reversing/ leaving the property. It is extremely dangerous because you cannot see cars coming up the road!! It‚Äôs an accident waiting to happen. This tree is overhanging the road! Please can the tree be cut back before there is an incident. This tree is the responsibility of Bromley Council. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsway, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trash outside my flat, 29th September
item.description:

item.title: Broken fencing now a danger of falling, 29th September
item.description:
